website_summaries.verdict: Comfortably warm winter boots that keep feet dry and come at a reasonable price.
pros: Laces allow adjustments for large calves
Side zipper makes it easy to get them on and off
cons: Not completely waterproof and not meant for harshest winters

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Warm Boots!
customer_reviews.text: I just received these boots today and I am over the moon for them. Aside from a quick trip to the bus stop, I haven't really given them a full hike yet but they are fantastic so far and incredibly warm with full insulation. The color is fantastic and not accurate in the preview images. I've included a few images for a more accurate reference.
customer_reviews.author: MegLab

customer_reviews.title: Wish I Could Wear These In Bed
customer_reviews.text: I have only had these boots for a couple of weeks, but in that time the state was hit with a blizzard and we got more than 2' of snow overnight. These boots stayed warm and dry the entire time I was outside despite the snow being as deep as they are tall. They truly are waterproof, and seem to be holding up nicely. They look nice, aren't too bulky to be fashionable, and are really comfortable. They don't feel too clunky to wear as street shoes after you shovel snow.
customer_reviews.author: Merigold

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wisconsin snowfall tested and approved! My feet stayed warm and dry!
customer_reviews.author: Smegg

customer_reviews.title: Warm boots, fit around calf is adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Boots fit as I expected them to; I can wear a thick pair of socks with them. The zipper is nice for putting on quickly. The ties in the front I thought were just decorative but are great for widening the portion on your lower leg. This is helpful if needing more room to tuck jeans into, for thick socks or if you have larger calves. The foot portion is a little stiff, I've had them three days and am trying to loosen them up. They are warm for sure. Update: they have loosened up. Good fit. They have been warm as dry when walking through snow and shoveling.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Very cute! Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly cute. I got them for my stepdaughter and now I want a pair! They are forgiving to large calves, so if you have bigger calves like me, don't be nervous to order, I tried them on and they're great!
customer_reviews.author: Shewhotravels

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten numerous compliments from people about these boots. They are practical, affordable, and stylish. 😁 What more do you need? The fabric material on the outside of the boot resembles felt. I wasn't so sure what to think about that part of the boot at first. However, my feet/legs didn't get wet in the snow and my legs stay really nice and warm in these boots. So, I am happy. :) You COULD buy more expensive boots, but for the price these are pretty great. (They run true to size. I also have wide feet and these worked great.)
customer_reviews.author: eFaith

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable, fits perfectly and are waterproof
customer_reviews.text: They are super perfect. After reading all the reviews I decided to order it and in my regular fit. They fit perfectly, and keeps your feet warm and dry. I went into snow... Got into a little water areas as well. And Yes they are waterproof. The grip is good and they are light weight so its comfortable as well. I personally bought these for my Canada trip and I would recommend this shoes to anyone who is looking for warm waterproof shoes. I bought the $24 design can't beat this price !
customer_reviews.author: Bhavs

customer_reviews.title: Odd fit, returned
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these boots for an upcoming vacation and i was truly disappointed. I returned the boots. They have a very odd fit. I ordered my size according to the chart. I tried to put them on when they arrived but the space between the inner sole and the top of the shoe was very thin. I do not have wide or thick feet and i didnt have on heavy socks. The white line on the boot where the material changes to the thick white trim on the bottom is about an inch space for your foot to fit. Really disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Cyrena

customer_reviews.title: Awesome,cute, warm and great. I loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome,cute, warm and great. I loved it. I wear 9.5 and I order a 9.5, fit great. I can;t wait for winter and snow. I'll come back here and tell you guy if it's really waterproof once I have a change to use it in snow.
customer_reviews.author: Pagu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I thought it was actually yellow but it's more tan than yellow, but still love it. Material is great and it fits great. I bought two and I love both
customer_reviews.author: Hawraa Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Literally the first time my wife tried on these boots they broke!
customer_reviews.text: Literally the first time my wife tried on these boots they broke! The upper grommets are poorly fastened. With just a slight tug one popped out. I can't imagine they could last long under normal use for anyone as the design appears to be extremely poor. It's a shame - they looked nice, but I can't recommend that anyone buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S. Strazzere

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and warm!
customer_reviews.text: Loved them so far. Haven't used them for snow since I bought them for our trip to Canada this winter, but they seem warm and are very cumfy. I got them a size bigger to wear thick socks and they fit perfect! There's enough room to tuck your pant into the boot so that's nice. Hopefully the snow doesn't go in though. I will inform later if it does........... Update: I've owned these boots for almost a year now and I have to say that I love love love them. I traveled to Canada 3 times last year during a very snowy season and these boots maintained my feet dry and warm with one pair of thick socks.
customer_reviews.author: Maralyjane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, if you are a fungus looking for a home.
customer_reviews.text: They look good and keep your feet warm. Unfortunately they are not waterproof.By the time I walked 50 yards into the park, the tops of my socks were picking up dew from the grass. Dry day, just dew on the grass. I will say they kept my feet warm, just the same. Perfect conditions for a fungal infection. The manufacturer would do well to find a way to keep the water from seeping aroundthe seams on top. Then they would be perfect. I'm not sure if I'm going to return them or just try to correct the problem myself with waterproof glue or something. I'm leaning towards returning them. There are better things out there.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I get so many compliments on these boots. From ...
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on these boots. From random strangers, even. I initially purchased them (Grey) solely for comfort and warmth, not realizing they would draw so much positive attention.
customer_reviews.author: K.A.

customer_reviews.title: Zipper ripped apart within a few months
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. I really loved these boots, got many compliments on them. Super frustrated that after only a few months the side zipper has ripped at the seam and is unrepairable. Of course, after the one month window of return so I'm left with boots that I love that I can no longer wear. So disappointing! Just wanted to wear my boots longer than a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: leratt

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT THE BOOTS A WEEK AGO. PRICE LOOKS GREAT. BUT ZERO TREAD FOR HARSH GREAT LAKES WINTERS. FUR DETERIORATED AND IS MATTED FROM SNOW. BOOTS DO NOT HOLD UP. AND WITH TWO PAIRS OF SOCKS ON, FEET STILL GOT WET. I TOOK A PHOTO OF THE DAY I UNBOXED THEM. WAS HAPPY. NOW I REGRET. BUYING THEM.
customer_reviews.author: CHASITY LYNN

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and bad fit.
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews I thought these boots would be a good investment. The price is very good, but don't expect these boots to be average quality. These boots are truly poor quality and should be more like $15. The fabric is very cheap and it has that strong chemical smell that usually comes in cheaply made shoes. The fit is somewhat small as I could feel the front of the boots touching my toes, which was pretty uncomfortable. The overall fit on my feet was uncomfortable. These are not worth it; I'm returning them and searching for a better pair elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: M.Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable nice looking boots.
customer_reviews.text: These boots fit as expected. I ordered my regular size and they are fine in regular or thick socks. I bought the Gray and they have sort or a knit fabric upper, good grip sole, so no slips on ice. Good room for the toes. Seem warm so far. I like that they have a side zip, so no need to fool with the laces each time you put them on or off.
customer_reviews.author: Paula S.

customer_reviews.title: I love them.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered mine 1.5 sizes bigger so I could put in 1/2 “ thick insoles with arch support, fit perfect, with the insoles feels like I’m wearing gym shoes. I had plantar fasciitis and the insoles worked great with these walking the dog. They look great and I received compliments. People think they are sorrel. These look sharp. The side zipper was just awesome for ease of putting on. I get into deep snow as I have Siberian dogs and they live this weather. I can easily pick up after them in knee deep snow and be out for an hour in 0 degree F weather and feel warm. No wetness, but a little damp, probably from foot sweat.
customer_reviews.author: BRT dog ownedTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: WORTH the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this boots! I usually wear size 7 and I ordered that same size- It fits perfectly! It looks trendy you can wear with leggings and sweaters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good deal
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE - January 2018 - Two (wintry) months later, I have increased my rating for these boots from 4 to 5 stars. My tween reports that they are comfortable and, given the correct socks, plenty warm for outdoor play in the upper midwest snow. ......... Cute boots. No surprises. Feet do seem to be waterproof but uppers are not. Not very warm. Also, insoles can't be removed, which means they can't be replaced with warmer versions (e.g. sheepskin liners).
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Mom

customer_reviews.title: Returning, raving reviews were wrong...
customer_reviews.text: Super uncomfortable, kinda narrow. Maybe runs half a size too small?? Wore for about 6 and a half hours and 3 hours later my toes and feet are still killing me... I even put inserts in them. These destroyed my feet and I never want to put them on again. Scuff really easily and never stay tied.. the calf is super wide and looks dumb on smaller legged girls. Sounds like a plastic bag when I walk? I have no idea why these have such good reviews when they're such cheap quality.
customer_reviews.author: CelesteTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! Very poor quality and no seller support.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. After only a couple of months the sole has completely separated from the upper part of the boot. I wrote the seller and received no reply. These boots have very poor quality and they do not last very long.
customer_reviews.author: bostonuser

customer_reviews.title: Sustained my trip to Germany in January
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a trip to Germany for January 2017. It snowed soo much there and these boots honestly kept my feet dry and warm. I had to walk allot in these shoes and I did not have one issue. They are slip free as well and very stylish. I received lots of compliments. My friends picked me up and threw me in a big pile of snow because they like to see me suffer, my body was cold but my feet were warm. I have wide feet and I am a size 8 in females and they fit perfect. I even had on thick black socks. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa e.

customer_reviews.title: Okay for Style, Not okay for a functioning boot.
customer_reviews.text: these look nice, but they are very very cheap. The fake fur is just on top of the boot. The glue is rough and scrapes my leg. They are not waterproof. There is no insulation at the bottom to keep your feet warm. If you are just purchasing for style this is a nice looking boot. If you are purchasing for function, ie walking in snow. This is not the boot for you. On a short walk in the woods, with a couple places of one inch standing water and temperatures of 26, my feet were freezing in these boots. After walking in the puddles my feet were soaking wet.
customer_reviews.author: Quinnsammi

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: I’ll start with I have only wore these a handful of times. I read reviews, they seemed great. The boots cane thy seemed great. The look nice and are easy to wear and was hoping they were going to be my go to boot! Unfortunately the last time I wore them my feet seemed cold and that Hadn't happened before. Turns out they were not cold, from the middle of my foot to my toes they were wet, some how snow/ water got in and that was it. I wish they would have worded out. I have now missed the return date by one day so I’m calling to see if there are other options.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Just WOW!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! I cannot say enough about these boots. This is my 3rd winter w them and they are still going strong. I would say they run a half size on the big side. I’m a 7.5-8 depending on the shoe. The 7.5 is perfect. Fitting on the larger side like an 8 w plenty of room for thick socks. These boots are warm, waterproof, do well on ice, and the zipper is God send for a busy parent running in and out all day. I just love them! Buy them you won’t regret it!!
customer_reviews.author: KingAramis

customer_reviews.title: Love these! True to size
customer_reviews.text: Love these! True to size, easy to get on and off, keep my feet nice and warm and dry. Also super cute! I have received so many compliments on how cute these are! I also love how lightweight they are compared to my bulky sorels. Bottom line I would absolutely purchase these again and recommend to all.
customer_reviews.author: jDilly1988

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the winter winters.
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfy and warm. I live in a very cold and snowy place and these are great. They fit snugly with my thicker socks on and that’s exactly what I want. True to color. The only thing was that the fur part was miss shape. During shipping and it took a few days of pulling and moving around for them to be reshaped. They are still not perfect but they look fine and I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: BChild

customer_reviews.title: I’m actually surprised at how much I like these boots
customer_reviews.text: I’m actually surprised at how much I like these boots. I figured for the money, I wouldn’t expect much but I’m pleasantly surprised! I can trek through the snow in these and no water seeps through, I forget I’m wearing them because they are so comfy and warm. They aren’t heavy at all, I would definitely order another pair when these wear out. I’m hoping to get 2-3 years out of them at least! I got the grey color and they look much nicer than the stock photo. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: mamabear16

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!! Great deal! Buy them
customer_reviews.text: For the price I was VERY happy!!! They are cute, and you stay dry and warm! You can wear them with or without a sock, I wore them with thin sock and it was perfect! The lining is warm, keeps snow out! I wore them in Big bear recently with tons of snow on the ground and they didn't disappoint! BUY THEM You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These boots run very small so buy 2-3 sizes up depending on how thick your socks in the boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots run very small so buy 2-3 sizes up depending on how thick your socks in the boots. I am a size 6. So I ordered a 6.5 and it was still too tight for me. I then ordered a 7.5 and that fits as expected. Shipping was quick as usual with prime and refund was quick too. Boots are very comfy too. Lots of people gave me compliments on the shoe. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Josephine

customer_reviews.title: REALLY OK BOOTS FOR THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Well, they are nice -- especially for the price! These would've been okay for me to keep, but I ordered 2 other pairs at the same time and liked a different pair better. These seemed just a bit lightweight, and it's real obvious that the upper part isn't real leather. There's a little bit of a papery, crackly feel to the upper parts, and the boots could definitely be a little bit thicker and more substantial. Guess I'm too used to UGG's, but the UGG's don't have a real good sole for traction in the snow; ergo, I needed snow boots. The fake-fur scruff on top really does look quite fake, too, which I wasn't in love with.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stylish boots!!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are awesome!!! I honestly wasn’t expecting much from these for the price, but thought I’d give it a shot. They fit true to size, but you may want to go up half a size if you plan on wearing them with thicker socks. They keep my feet and legs toasty warm and dry! They are adorable with jeans and leggings and SUPER comfortable. They are light weight and non constricting as I walk, but seem like they’re well made and will hold up great. I’ve only had them for about a week so I can’t attest to that for sure, but they seem to be of decent quality! Love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica_rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Broke Immediately... Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! I read the reviews for these boots before buying, thought I was getting a good deal. They were a lot thinner than I imagined but was still hopeful. I bought my exact size and they were small. I tried to lace them up and the metal clasp that holds the laces on IMMEDIATELY snapped. I never got to wear them once. Very poorly made. Returning them now.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Attractive boot. Runs narrow.
customer_reviews.text: These boots run narrow. I wear a 7.5 medium and these boots "just"fit. I can wear them with thin socks. No room for heavy socks. They are attractive, however there is not a lot of insulating value. Not suitable to wear if you are planning on spending a lot of time outdoors due to the insulation factor. The calf portion is a woven fabric and very likely would not keep moisture out if worn in deep, wet snow. I use then to go to the chicken coop and back to the house on a shoveled path. They do have good traction. The design of the calf does make it adjustable if your calves are wider.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these boots. They fit really well and the color was as expected. They are waterproof, but my toes have been getting cold even with thick socks on in weather in the teens. I love the zipper and not having to lace up every time! I would recommend to anyone, but if you're looking for a true winter boot-these won't keep you super super warm!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey18

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide widths
customer_reviews.text: They are cute, and just the way they looked in the pictures, but they were too narrow for my feet even though I ordered up a half size. I told it I wear extra wide on the size guide, and it still told me to buy get the same size. People seemed to think they were roomy so I hoped half a size would do, but they are still much too narrow for me and too long. I'm also disappointed because I thought I could do a free return if it didn't work out, but they charged me a little over $5 to return it 😟
customer_reviews.author: VM

customer_reviews.title: Warm, dry, & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We love these boots in our household. They are very warm and so far our feet have stayed dry. The sizes are exactly as what we wear, no sizing up or down. I have purchased four pair of these total, For my girls and myself. One of my daughters loves her boots so much she wears them to work at her fast food place of employment (on her feet constantly) and rarely takes them off. We all have had so many compliments and people asking where to purchase. This had to be the best purchase I've made in Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Sbnfb

customer_reviews.title: Sized very small, nice style however.
customer_reviews.text: Size was not close to my normal size (over many shoes purchased and many styles). They were one size too small, really more accurate to state two sizes too small. I'm not difficult to fit, it could have been partly the style but after I returned these shoes, I purchased a pair of high-top boots in my normal size and they fit perfectly. I liked the style of these shoes, they didn't fit however.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell Casey

customer_reviews.title: ... her feet were cold and she didn't have a good pair of boots
customer_reviews.text: Bought for wife because she said her feet were cold and she didn't have a good pair of boots. She was a little skeptical about them at first because they weren't the exact color she would've picked, but they fit her well with a tiny bit of extra room. She did receive tons of compliments and now she really enjoys them. I'm rating 4 - stars, because her feet still get a little cold when she doesn't wear thick socks. Other than that, they fit her great and she thinks there really comfortable once broken in. She particularly likes the zip up feature and her feet have not gotten wet at all.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN M OROURKE

customer_reviews.title: Fit great
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, but when I need to replace these eventually I will choose a style where they are able to be slid on and off. I almost chose a different pair and I wish I had. It always isn't the easiest to find a chair to sit down, unzip, slide foot in, zip back up. The other pair was pull on, so possible to do while standing. Other than that they look great, feel fine, and keep feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: SapphireMoon

customer_reviews.title: Warm, Comfortable, and So Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Omigosh I love these boots! I got them for a weekend trip to Chicago and they were perfect. I wore regular ankle socks with them and my feet were so warm the whole time (but not overly warm at all). We were walking about five miles a day all weekend and they felt great on my feet. And I got compliments on how cute they were everywhere I went! I just love the pic I got of them out on the Skydeck. They fit true to size. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Djhope711

customer_reviews.title: 1712 in black
customer_reviews.text: They’re super cute and comfy! I got them in a 6.5 which is what I usually wear in boots but there’s still plenty of room for thick socks if needed. Only bummer is I thought they had zippers but they don’t. Update, I’ve used them in snow and they do their job! My feet stay nice and dry. I’ve also gotten many compliments on them. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable I'd walk it them all day
customer_reviews.text: Super warm and extremely comfortable. I did spray it with silicone water guard just in case, and my feet have been dry and warm every time I wear these. I think they are cute too, I'd get them in more colors if I lived somewhere that had enough snow storms to justify owning 2 pairs of winter boots. I'd love it if there was an option to remove the faux fur if we wanted to, but with this it's pretty impossible to remove, so be sure you like the fur trim.
customer_reviews.author: Amy F

customer_reviews.title: Meh....
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 6 in women and these were so snug that they kind of hurt my toes. I don’t recommend with thick socks, which is sad for a winter boot. The tongue of these is a bit floppy and cheap so they kind of look like a mess while on. The fur gets kind of matter after they get a little wet. These were just okay but I’d pass if I could do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great for snow
customer_reviews.text: These boots were perfect for a short trip in Colorado. They are warm and the traction is great in snow, especially for someone who has never been in snow before. They look great too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new pair of winter boots to handle the hard Michigan winters, and these boots were PERFECT! During the recent sub-zero temps, these boots kept my feet very warm while wearing regular (not wool or winter) socks. They are true to size, and I didn't have compromise on style. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Zerillo

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I an sort of blown away at how cheap these boots are! They are super comfortable and made out of thick quality feeling materials. I have no complaints. I was debating on spending over $100 on new snow boots but as the season is almost over I decided to try these. And I'm glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: JessPitt

customer_reviews.title: These boots are pretty awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I'm totally happy with these boots! They are indeed waterproof (I've tested them out on rainy days and snowy days in NYC). They're also very warm and very comfy. The price couldn't be beat. After developing a leak in my Khombu boots, I wanted to find a boot that was good and durable, yet cute and trendy. SO glad I came to Amazon. I highly recommend these. I've received several compliments on them. I bought the wheat color, it's a similar color to a regular set of Timbs (Timberland boots). Great price, love the color, warm, waterproof, snow proof, totally worth it. I may buy another pair to keep since they're on sale now.
customer_reviews.author: J. Folkes

customer_reviews.title: So I bought these snow boots in Wheat-Women's size 11 and I LOVE them!
customer_reviews.text: Omgosh!!! So I bought these snow boots in Wheat-Women's size 11 and I LOVE them!! They are super comfortable for long walks in the snow or just to look cute!! I work thick socks with them to help keep my feet warm and my feet didn't feel crammed!! I normally wear a women's size 11 (women's size 12 in running shoes) and I bought the 11 boots- perfect fit even with thick socks!!! I abaolirely LOVE these boots!!!! I highly recommend them!! Also: I've worn these boots on three separate trips from 0* to 35* and trended through 3 feet of snow with no problem!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for walking around in a snowy city
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for a weekend trip to Okd Quebec City in December. It was supposed to snow and be in sub zero temps. I’m happy to say I was able to walk around for several hours at the outdoor Christmas Market with warm, dry feet! They also provide decent traction in harsh conditions. They’re perfect boots for walking around in snowy conditions but I’m not sure how they would hold up if I were to go snow tubing and have my feet submerged in snow as the uppers are fabric. They met my expectations for what I needed them for!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Sandelli

customer_reviews.title: Really cool boots. Perfect for my bigger calves. Zipper falls :(
customer_reviews.text: Really cool boots. Perfect for my bigger calves. I am usually a 7 but got the 8 and they are perfect for thicker sock days. I will probably get inserts to help with arch support, but otherwise love em! Update: After wearing these boots for a full day, I have to add that they don't even really need the extra support (unless you usually need arch support in your shoes). But one thing I especially want to pass on is that the side zipper falls down during the day. I have never experienced this with a boot before. I am buying a hook and eye set to sew into the fur lining at the top to keep this from happening.
customer_reviews.author: cindy taren

customer_reviews.title: Too loose!
customer_reviews.text: Returned it. Bought two different sizes because I wasn’t sure which size to get, but BOTH were very loose around the ankle, no matter how tight I tied the bottle “rungs.” Didn't like the feeling of my heel lifting up from the boot when I walked. Maybe I have tiny ankles, so if that’s the case, not recommended for ppl with tiny ankles lol.
customer_reviews.author: M. S.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not practical
customer_reviews.text: Not that comfortable. I didn't care for the quality at all either. The part around your foot is made of almost like a craft foam texture and it definitely isn't waterproof (not even a little bit). And then when I sprayed with waterproofing spray, it just absorbed it immediately and didn't work in the slightest. They are cute, but not comfortable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED REVIEW
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a trip to Calgary. They were nice enough to walk around for a while when it was -15 C out. If I stayed out for longer than half an hour my feet started to freeze hahahahahah Update (2018): I am currently living in Calgary, and these boots are my goto pair when it’s snowing. My previous review was made under the assumption that good boots are those that keep your feet warm... When in reality warmth is all about wearing GOOD wool socks. Now, don’t get me wrong, that doesn’t mean that any boots will do. Just make sure they’re waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: ... price to ship them back so I'm kind of disappointed. I would just be aware before you buy ...
customer_reviews.text: These little boots are warm I found them very stiff hard and uncomfortable tho and to send them back is a joke at $20 being the cheapest price to ship them back so I'm kind of disappointed . I would just be aware before you buy at such a high cost to ship back for a refund if they are uncomfortable and hurt your feet .
customer_reviews.author: Bernice Dimiceli

customer_reviews.title: Nice freaking boots!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered half size up as I knew I’d need to. These boots are great. Just moved to Juneau Alaska and did not have anything that would suffice the rain and ice ice ice!!! Nice tread. Hoping upper is waterproof will spray just to be certain. Love them great price. Lace up the front for custom fit and dude zipper for easy off/on!!!!
customer_reviews.author: kathleen brundege

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and I️ wore them every day for 14 days
customer_reviews.text: I️ bought these for our trip to Alaska. After reading the reviews I️ got a 6.5 my normal size and they fit perfectly!!! So comfortable and I️ wore them every day for 14 days. They kept my feet warm but not to hot. They are so cute too and I️ got a lot of compliments on them. Don’t know about water proof as I️ never got them wet. I️ would definitely buy them again!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Baker

customer_reviews.title: I got a size up from my normal size because ...
customer_reviews.text: I got a size up from my normal size because I wanted to wear thick socks with this. It worked as I thought it would, if you want to wear a really thick sock with these boots, size up. If you are ok with normal weight socks, get your normal size, because they are true to size. I bought the chevron ones, and they appear high quality and well made, pictures were accurate. I wore them in snow in Colorado and no leaks, perfectly waterproof!
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! True to size and so warm!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these boots! To be honest, I wasn't expecting much for the price, but I LOVE them! They are so warm and keep my feet dry in the snow. It snowed a few weekends back so I pulled these out and I haven't been able to put them back even though there's no more snow! Great buy! Size ran true, may feel a little snug width wise, but not uncomfortable. I think about boots need to be snug anyway so you don't twist an ankle in the snow.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: They fit like they should
customer_reviews.text: I bought these the week of the blizzard in the beginning of the year that happened along the east coast because unfortunately a part of my job includes being around for snow removal. They fit like they should, the are water proof, they helped me make it through with all of the shoveling and snow blowing. They are also fashionable to wear in the winter time with leggings or straight legged pants. I would buy these boots again
customer_reviews.author: danielle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect winter boot!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots so much!!! So far they have been through 2 Midwest winters and still look as new as the day I received them. Very comfortable and stylish too! Would definitely order them again!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy R.

customer_reviews.title: stays dry
customer_reviews.text: i have had these for a while and i have never had a problem with my feet getting wet. they always stay dry. they are not falling apart they are super durable. my feet are always warm in them and they never get cold when i have them on. i even took these snowboarding and walked in high snow and my feed stayed warm and dry. i have had these for a couple years and there still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect! Awesome quality! I recommend these boots!
customer_reviews.text: I have not had the opportunity to try them out in the snow, but hopefully will do this winter. I'm impressed with the quality of the boots and how well made they are. They fit me very well as described and they feel very comfortable. I definitely recommend these boots 100% no questions asked! I would like to find the same quality for my spouse. I will definitely look for this manufacturer / provider!
customer_reviews.author: Flor - Henry

customer_reviews.title: ... than I normally wear and while the boots are adorable and I ordered a wide width
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size larger than I normally wear and while the boots are adorable and I ordered a wide width, they are still a bit snug. I had on thick socks which is needed for cold weather and my foot felt a bit cramped. I decided to return the boots and go up another 1/2 size. I don't feel like breaking in a damned thing. Otherwise, they did feel warm and almost comfortable. When I get the other size, I'll see how the boots feel. Trying to get ready for the New York winter before we're bombarded with snow. It will come one day!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tempestj

customer_reviews.title: South Dakota winter approved
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and very warm! They have great traction for walking on snow or ice. I've walked through some pretty deep puddles and my feet have stayed dry. Great boot for the price! I live in South Dakota where it gets very very cold and we can get a ton of snow, and these have been my go-to pair of boots all winter so they have been tried and tested. I'm happy to say they passed.
customer_reviews.author: kes

customer_reviews.title: buy your true size
customer_reviews.text: my feet size 8m, since need thick wool I need bigger size so order 9m and little big for me. I used this in Michigan trip and did help handle with the cold. I dropped in deep snow and not wet..surprise ..quality ok for me but in appearance only good for sky or doing something with snow. if for fashion to chubby ,,, but who need outlook if this can deal with snow
customer_reviews.author: Rushdd

customer_reviews.title: Best Boots Ever
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these boots! I really didn't want boots with zippers because they malfunction so often on boots - I accidentally ordered two pair (that was a surprise) but my daughter wears the same size and she lives them too! Warm, really comfortable, good for deep snow, slush, icy conditions; they have great traction on icy walkways and easy on/off. Had them a few months, they still look brand new. I live in Alaska and in Central Oregon and BOTH places had record snowfall this winter. These are the best winter boots I've ever owned, and my kid agrees.
customer_reviews.author: S.P.

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE BOOTS! Absolutely love them. They fit great, and they are so adorable. I couldn't be happier with my purchase! I was nervous about ordering boots like these online because it's so hard to know how they will fit, but I am so glad that I took the chance and ordered these ones. They are very waterproof (I wore them during our huge snow storms over this past month and had warm, dry feet all day), and I love the way they look. For the price, they really can't be beat! I've received so many compliments on them whenever I wear them, and they definitely compete with the more expensive snow boots I've had my eye on.
customer_reviews.author: hayhunts

customer_reviews.title: Great style, warmth and comfort for less than $50.
customer_reviews.text: Can't say how much I love these boots. Didn't expect the quality and the style for boots worth less than $50. But, these boots have it all. Comfort, style and warmth. I have not worn them in snow yet so can't talk about water proof. But, in cold weather they are great. Love the side zipper, easy on and off. Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Corman

customer_reviews.title: They look great, but I can't speak to how well they ...
customer_reviews.text: Because these were boots, I ordered a half a size larger figuring I would want room for heavy socks. I unfortunately, had to return and Order My True size. My only complaint, is that I cannot lace them tight enough at the ankle without scrunching up all of the material since the tongue doesn't separate from the boots until apprx 2in. up from the ankle. I am assuming this is necessary in order to keep the weather out. They look great, but I can't speak to how well they wear yet as I haven't hit the snow with them as of this writing. They look fairly well made though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I live in upstate NY and wore these for the first time yesterday. They are everything I wanted at a great price. We can get quite a lot of snow in this area and they will be just fine in it. They are warm, comfortable and have great tread on the bottom which you need in icy, cold, snowy Central New York weather. They also look good too! Can't beat them! I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KARR

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously WARM, comfy, stylish!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so warm! For the last few days in Boston, where I live, it’s been -12 F when factoring in wind chill. My feet haven’t even gotten chilled whatsoever. Very toasty warm! I happened to go to L.L.Bean for slippers and other shoppers in the shoe department asked me about mine and even took a picture of my order on amazon! Of all the selections in the store they said they’d prefer to go on amazon and buy these ones instead! I’ve been getting a lot of complements on them as well, and they are soooo comfortable! It’s like walking on pillows!
customer_reviews.author: Julie A. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great boots for a good price
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great. I just tried them out this weekend in New York during this weekend's major blizzard and they were fabulous when I went out side to clean off my car. We had about 5-6 inches and my feet stayed perfectly warm and dry. I first bought them as a 9.5, but they were a little small. I requested a size 10 and the company quickly exchanged them with no problem. They were friendly and professional. I would definitely buy from them again. The size 10 fits great. I normally wear a 9-9.5 in shoes so I suggest buying a size/half size bigger for comfort. I absolutely recommend these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Anderson

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Due to the enormous amount of snow, I have had the opportunity to try them out. I wear a size 10 but I opted for a 10.5. I tried on shoes similar to those in different stores and the 10 was always snug. The 10.5 is perfect, holds up against the cold temperatures and snow fall. I was out in temperature about 8 degrees and with socks I was fine. I needlessly to say I didn’t try to stay out too long. The fit is good, slightly stiff in one place, yet comfortable and warm.
customer_reviews.author: marta

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I hardly ever ski - so I just wanted some cheap after ski snow boots to wear on an upcoming trip - these looked cute and were super cheap, so I figured I would give them a shot - since I probably won't go skiing again for another 10 years and these only have to last a week - tops. I figured they would probably hurt my feet - but I could deal for a week. However, imagine my surprise when I received them and they are actually comfortable??? Boy, was I pleasantly surprised. Thank you. So......... cute, comfortable and very affordable - what else you want?
customer_reviews.author: Susan from Texas

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic chic boots
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic chic boots. The fur top is a little extra but definitely warm. The boots fit fantastically, with a little bit of room in the toe for thicker socks but still not making the boot feel tight. You can adjust to your ankle/calf size with the laces and then unzip the side to pull your foot out, which is fantastic. Extra warm without making feet sweaty and totally waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: TINA

customer_reviews.title: Ehh ... not impressed
customer_reviews.text: The boots look good, but they are stiff and not very comfortable. The fabric and other materials look to be lower quality than I was expecting, especially when comparing this boot to very similar ones from other companies. I'm not impressed. For the price, this should be more than a fashion piece.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Ragsdale

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots! But need soft cushion on the bottom.
customer_reviews.text: It's fit so far but only i notice when i wearing it too long for a long walk. My feet is hurting a little bit because the bottom is hard i think i should buy a soft cushion on the bottom for more comfortable to use longer. My feet is very small and wearing a not that thick socks. Over all it's nice boots i wear them when i went for winter break at Utah.
customer_reviews.author: jeniners

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful boots...a tiny bit small
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my teenage daughter, who is just growing into a size 7 in women's shoes. I bought the size 7, and they fit perfectly with a regular pair of socks on. I would probably order a 1/2 size up next time. She hasn't yet worn them in the snow, but when she was trying them on, she raved about how soft and comfortable they are! And I love that they have a tie closure as well as a zipper! She has very skinny legs, so this way we can lace them up once as tight as needed, and then use the zipper to easily slip them on and off!
customer_reviews.author: Mando

customer_reviews.title: Buy these. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally buy shoes/boots online, and took a gamble on this. Pleasantly surprised. Not only are these cute and keep the feet warm and cozy, they fit as effected for the size purchased. Right now at $14.95 you can not go wrong for that price Score! Waterproof on these boots is only on the shoe portion right you the ankle. Hey, it's cute snow boots to wear on slightly less than mild winter weather, not hip wader. Stitching on boots is well. Does not rip or tear easily. Comfortable to wear. 100 percent pressed with purchase. Will buy again from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: These boots were amazing! I walked in several inches of snow while ...
customer_reviews.text: Went to Chicago for a quick 2-day trip where it snowed several inches and the temperatures reached -4 degrees while I was outside. These boots were amazing! I walked in several inches of snow while I was there and they kept my feet warm and cozy. I received compliments on the look of them from family that lived there. I would give it more stars if I could, especially for what I paid for them. In fact, I left them behind for a family member who was staying longer and she is going to buy a pair for herself. :-)
customer_reviews.author: A. Cabello

customer_reviews.title: Room for improvement but great at this price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the "grey" color and thought the accent color was yellow based on the photos. It's definitely brown in person. That said they are good boots. The way the tongue goes up the middle can be kind of uncomfortable but if you take the time to really smooth it down when you put them on it's fine. Fit as expected. Warm.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Q.

customer_reviews.title: These boots are amazing! This is my 3rd pair of snowboots this ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots are amazing! This is my 3rd pair of snowboots this winter. Once I found these, I literally wore them daily. My problem typically is that my toes get cold from the rubber at the toe. These ones have lining all the way to the toes. Kept my feet toasty warm. The zipper on the inside ankle was great so I rarely had to tie the boots. I have wide calves and these fit perfect even with my jeans (not jeggings) tucked inside. Would definitely buy these again!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn R

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, light and roomy
customer_reviews.text: I really like these boots. They are very comfortable and light. There is enough room for my toes. I tried them in the snow, no leakage and they kept my feet warm. Great for waking. My only thing is I wish they had laces higher because the foldable part is very plapppy. I adopted and used the flappy part as another loop for the shoelaces. It’s working so far. I would buy thirds again. Let’s see how they last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tongue Flaps?
customer_reviews.text: Like everything except that the boot does not tie all the way up. The tongue flap of the boot roos down making the boots look slouchy. It looks silly. I have to tie the top of the boots with a black headband to hold the tongue flap and sides of the show up to conform to my calf. I will post pictures later.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Belliard

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, foot support, and warm.
customer_reviews.text: This boots are so comfy and warm. They really do the trick. Unfortunately, one of my coworkers is a hater and reported me for wearing them at work so I can no longer rock them daily. I beat the system on snow days and wear them anyways but change once I'm at my desk. The water-proofness stops right below the ankle line. If you're in deep snow, be careful but I still love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: JerseyGal

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I've been wanting a good pair of winter boots since moving back to Minnesota, but didn't want to break the bank in the process. These are very decently priced, fit well (I ordered a size up so I could wear them with thick/double socks), and they're really cute! I've received lots of compliments and look forward to snowy days so I can wear them. They're also nice and warm and have both laces and a side zipper, so they can get on and off easily, but also stay nice and tight and keep out the snow.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Harold Ask

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic for the price. I bought them for a camping trip that was expected to be wet and they worked out beautifully. I was hesitant about purchasing because historically, higher boots don't fit as I have large calves. Someone else posted about their large calves so I thought I'd give these a try. So glad I did! They were comfortable, wore well and kept my feet warm and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly V.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the stylish look... however, I wore these boots off and on for 1 month and they are already shot! Cold, wet feet. :( Very dissatisfied as this was my second purchase-- loved the boots and had no issues with the first pair I had!!! :( Now I am being told that the window for returns is passed. Not a happy customer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brett L. Bradstreet

customer_reviews.title: Good Winter Boots for Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a vacation to Colorado. I'm from Texas and don't own any type of winter boots. I wear a size 8, but ordered these 8.5 because that size was way cheaper when I ordered them. I figured I would be wearing thick socks anyway, so assumed they would be ok, and they were. They kept my feet dry when we played in the snow, and they they were easy to put on and take off. They worked great for my vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Sam H.

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart before the end of the season
customer_reviews.text: I work outside half the day, though I don’t do a lot of physical work. These boots were great for a couple months then quickly fell a part. The soles came away from the rest of the boot, making them completely unusable. For the price, I was hoping they’d at least last me through a season. Too bad, because they were otherwise comfortable and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Bryanne

customer_reviews.title: Horribly cheap, tight, uncomfortable boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very cheaply-made. You get what you pay for with these (if you are paying $30 or less). The sides make crunchy sounds when you walk, they are very tight and uncomfortable, and I can't imagine them being waterproof with all the holes in them, not to mention the zipper!!!!! Don't waste your money on these. Try the Kamik waterproof winter boots with faux fur on the top- now those are very well made and comfortable!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Warm, stylish, need inserts for support
customer_reviews.text: I wore these all winter in upstate NY (in lots of snow) and they kept me warm and dry. They're a bit on the big side (I have narrow feet) and needed inserts for arch support/comfort. Even with the extra purchase of the insert, they're a much more affordable version of Sorrels and get the job done just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mya

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Iceland
customer_reviews.text: Went to Iceland for a week, these boots were perfect. Can't beat the price, my friend paid around $70-$80 for the same kind of boots. Definitely worthwhile getting these for snow/rainy weather. I hiked through mud and stayed dry.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sard002

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Loved these boots!! Traveled to the Pacific northwest and it rained everyday and these boots were waterproof and comfortable for a lot of walking. They even kept me warm and dry in the snow!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli H

customer_reviews.title: The stitched looking part is actually pretty quality. I have not worn them in any ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size up because I was afraid they wouldn't be true to size. But they are! I was skeptical that they were 14.99. They appear to be decent quality. I needed a new pair because my winter boots gave out with not much wintet left but plenty of cold/muddy/wet season left. I naturally didn't want to break the bank. The stitched looking part is actually pretty quality. I have not worn them in any real typea of weather yet. I will update if thwy end up being anything less than good!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Nice boots for the price. Fit as expected. First used them on a Scout camp in shallow snow. My feet stayed dry but did get cold after a while. I am still rating them five star because I have never owned a pair or boots that would actually keep my feet warm in the snow.
customer_reviews.author: Oshiana Allen

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these. The sizing is slightly bigger... I usually wear an 8 or 8 1/2 and I ordered the 8 1/2 in case I wanted to wear some thicker socks. If you order, stick to your exact size as they run a little big. These are super easy to get on and off, my feet stay dry and warm and they are stylish. I would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Kingshow Women’s Globalwin Waterproof Winter Boots
product_meta.description: As days become shorter and the snow starts to fall, slip your feet into the GW 1560 waterproof, warm and cozy winter boot. Designed for cold and wet outdoor conditions, these boots feature waterproof protection and microfiber and heat Reflective lining, maximizing warmth and comfort all-day. The durable rubber outsole will lets you challenge the winter wilderness. We have new styles every year
feature_bullets: Fully lined with soft faux fur to keep the feet warm in winter days
